div.head: Description of changes for 2013.01
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied fromm a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor text. A transcription of the Sorbonne ms still needs to be completed and added. Correctsions and additions will follow, after a collation comparision of available manuscript witnessess. Difficult transcription spots have been marked as unclear. Most name elements have been liinked to their canonical instance with a ref attribute. Citations, cross-references, a critical apparatus still await constructions.
